name: BWP Communications
tagline: We are a research-driven advertising agency.
description: BWP is a research-based creative agency that exists to build and strengthen the emotional connection between consumer and brand.  Both a traditional and digital agency, we've been in operation for 23 years serving a base of local and national brands and organizations. BWP is small enough to be flexible and agile yet large enough to deliver and execute the most comprehensive branding, marketing, advertising and PR campaigns.
